item.name: Ruth Ozeki
item.author: A Tale for the Time Being

description.html: I loved this book even before it got into the connection between Buddhism (illusion of duality) and quantum physics (many worlds, illusion of wave function collapse). Also, really digging these books that sprinkle in metafictional elements without being meta-for-meta’s sake. I mean, I’m glad if on a winter’s night a traveler exists but it’s kind of like a 7 minute guitar solo.
